events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen has a large scratch and some dead pixels. This is really disappointing as I expected a new device.
The issue has been categorized under Product Defect based on the customer's report of a damaged laptop screen.
The case has been assigned to support agent Emily Thompson for further assistance with the damaged product.
Hello, this is Emily from support. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen. Let's work together to resolve this promptly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and dead pixels on the laptop screen? This will help us assess the damage properly.
I have attached several clear photos showing the scratched screen and the area with dead pixels. Please check and advise on the next steps.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let me know which option you prefer so we can proceed accordingly.
I would prefer a replacement unit, as I still want this laptop but obviously in perfect condition. Thanks for the quick response.
The replacement request has been processed and your new laptop will be shipped within 3 business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and that everything is working perfectly. Please let us know if you need any further help.
We are closing this case now as the replacement was delivered successfully and there have been no further issues reported. Thank you for your cooperation.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback will help us improve our service in the future.
